name: Jared_Lancaster
text:
Jared Lancaster
Jared Lancaster was a character from Invitation to Love, portrayed by Evan St. Vincent.
In one episode, Jared wrote a suicide note to his daughters, Jade and Emerald, stating that he was planning to take his life due to financial difficulties. However, Jade convinced him to change his mind and he altered his will to leave the Towers to her.
Jared was seen in a later episode, gagged and witnessing Montana beat up and threaten Jared's son-in-law, Chet Weems. Jared witnessed Chet shoot Montana and stood by him as Montana stared at them in horror.
